en.description: This permission enable administration management
This permission enable users to read/view all the Journals
This permission enable users to create new Journal
This permission enable users can delete any journal

en.display_name: Export All Journal in Excel & Pdf
en.description: This permission enable users can able to export journals as excel & pdf
This Permission enable users to read any contributor group in the any journal.
This Permission enable users to write any contributor group in the any journal.
This Permission enable users to delete any contributor group in the any journal.

en.display_name: Add User to Any Journal Group
en.description: This Permission enable user to add user to Any Journal Group in Any Journal.

en.display_name: Remove User from Any Journal Group
en.description: This Permission enable user to remove user to Any Journal Group in Any Journal.
This Permission enable user to add user to our platform.
This Permission enable user to write any user in our platform.
This Permission enable user to delete any user in our platform.

en.display_name: Export All users in Excel & Pdf
en.description: This Permission enable user to download All users data in PDF & Excel formats.
This Permission enable user to Read Any Administration level roles.
This Permission enable user to Write Any Administration role.
This Permission enable user to Delete Any Administration role.

en.display_name: Add Any User to Any Administration Role
en.description: This Permission enable user to Add any User to any Administration role.

en.display_name: Remove User from Any Administration Role
en.description: This Permission enable user to remove any User from any Administration role.

en.display_name: Export all Administration Roles in Excel & Pdf
en.description: This Permission Enable user to Download All Journal in PDF & Excel formats
